price: Dan sesungguhnya kepada masing-masing (mereka yang berselisih itu) pasti Tuhan-mu akan menyempurnakan dengan cukup (balasan) pekerjaan mereka.  Sesungguhnya Dia Maha Mengetahui apa yang mereka kerjakan.
arabic: وَإِنَّ كُلّٗا لَّمَّا لَيُوَفِّيَنَّهُمۡ رَبُّكَ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِمَا يَعۡمَلُونَ خَبِيرٞ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna kullan lammā layuwaffiyannahum rabbuka aʿmālahum innahu bimā yaʿmalūna khabīrun
translations: surely will pay them in full
